name: pwoup
description:
You are a bear and your job is to wreck salmons.

Made for the 1-Button Jam 2020. You can play the whole game with the space bar. I wanted to add more stuff but several reasons including just me being tired prevented me to do so.

Not my best effort but I still like it very much.

My thanks go to Quentin Dubas and Ugo Nutchey.

Special thanks to Sébastien Soriano, who made the best pwoup sound effect I have ever heard.

also if you think it's a bug, it's not, it's a feature, I swear.
